scripts.dev:backend: concurrently -k -n "USER,ORDER,PAY,DELIV,REST,NOTIF" -c "blue,magenta,green,cyan,yellow,white" "npm run dev --prefix Food-Delivery-Backend/user-service" "npm run dev --prefix Food-Delivery-Backend/order-service" "npm run dev --prefix Food-Delivery-Backend/payment-service" "npm run dev --prefix Food-Delivery-Backend/delivery-service" "npm run dev --prefix Food-Delivery-Backend/restaurant-service" "npm run dev --prefix Food-Delivery-Backend/notification-service"
scripts.dev:frontend: concurrently -k -n "CUST,REST,DRIV" -c "bgBlue,bgYellow,bgCyan" "npm run dev --prefix Food-Delivery-Customer-Frontend" "npm run dev --prefix Food-Delivery-Restaurant-Frontend" "npm run dev --prefix Food-Delivery-Courier-Frontend"
scripts.dev: npm run infra:up && echo 'Waiting for Infra...' && npm run db:wait && echo 'Seeding Database...' && npm run db:seed && echo 'Starting Services...' && concurrently -k "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
